title: BMMI06
reasons_remedies: Trim Bin sensor blocked by trim or other objest.
Clear the trim or the object blocking the trim bin sensor.
Dismount the sensor and check if sensor is giving false output. If so replace the sensor.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMI06
Error Code 06
Category: BMMI
Title: BMMI06
Alarm Message: Trims Bin Full
Description: Trims collection bin is full.
Reason & Remedy:
1. Trims Bin is Full.
2. Empty the Trim bin.
3. Trim Bin sensor blocked by trim or other objest.
4. Clear the trim or the object blocking the trim bin sensor.
5. Sensor is faulty.
6. Dismount the sensor and check if sensor is giving false output. If so replace the sensor.
Visual References:
